Docs.param: The settings for the fabric transport. If the settings are not provided or null, default settings with no security.
The callback client that receives the callbacks from the service.
Service partition resolver to resolve the service endpoints. If not specified, a default service partition resolver returned by is used.
Exception handlers to handle the exceptions encountered in communicating with the service.
Id to use in diagnostics traces from this component.
Serialization Provider to serialize and deserialize request and response.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructs a fabric transport based service remoting client factory.
Docs.remarks: This factory uses an internal fabric transport exception handler to handle exceptions at the fabric TCP transport level and a , in addition to the exception handlers supplied to the constructor.
